name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-bot-framework-secure
title: Secure Bot Framework
shortDescription: This sample shows how to secure your conversation including the use of a Direct Line token instead of secret, for user id, generate it inside client side and detect if the client has changed the user ID and reject the change.
longDescription: This sample shows how to secure your conversation including the use of a Direct Line token instead of secret, for user id, generate it inside client side and detect if the client has changed the user ID and reject the change.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
